title: Ep. 431: Chris Mayer's Favorite Stock Ideas
itunes:title: Chris Mayer's Favorite Stock Ideas
description: Chris Mayer, former corporate banker and 20-year plus market veteran, talks about his latest trip to Europe and how investors can position themselves following Brexit. He breaks down the European banks and tells us why this sector has incredible upside for long-term investors.  Chris also shares his favorite small-cap ideas. He travels the world to find these unique opportunities that could offer investors life-changing returns. Plus, Chris shares his personal experiences with billionaire and Agora founder Bill Bonner, now that he's managing Bill's personal stock portfolio.
